scripts.test: npm run -s formatter -- -l && npm -s run build && jest
scripts.build:textures: aseprite -b assets/images/*.aseprite --filename-format '{tag} {frame}' --list-tags --list-slices --data src/assets/atlas.json --sheet-pack --inner-padding 1 --sheet src/assets/images/atlas.png && aseprite -b src/assets/images/atlas.png --palette assets/index-lut.gpl --save-as src/assets/images/atlas.png
scripts.palettize: cd assets && find images -name \*.aseprite -exec aseprite '{}' -b --palette palette.aseprite --save-as '{}' \; && aseprite -b palette.aseprite --save-as ../src/assets/images/palette.png
